Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, west of the Oceancrest Ministry of Knowledge.
Room.LongDescription: Rosecrest runs from north to south at this point in the city, and passes by the famous Oceancrest Ministry of Knowledge. Although not quite the same as the Ministry of Truth, the Ministry of Knowledge is much more interested in preserving documents and records then it is in arguing about the meaning of life or the purpose of the universe. The Ministry is very secretive, and access is restricted to only the few who know the correct protocol.
